TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProjectSchemaNode

Docs.summary: Defines an interface that all root classes from project schema XAML files must implement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<object> GetSchemaObjects(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of static data to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type.
Docs.returns: Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type. Returns or Empty list if no objects of the given type are provided by this node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Type> GetSchemaObjectTypes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.
Docs.returns: Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.
